kubejs.ponder.starlight_charging.header: How to use the starlight charger
kubejs.ponder.starlight_charging.text_1: The Starlight charger is capable gaining charge while under moonlight.
kubejs.ponder.starlight_charging.text_2: Four pillars each 2 blocks away from the center must be built, with a certain block on top. The blocks under this can be any block
kubejs.ponder.starlight_charging.text_3: Crimson Steel, Azure Electrum, and Tyrian Steel allow different level of star charge.
kubejs.ponder.starlight_charging.text_4: Use a catalyst along with charge to add the starlight charged modifer to materials.
